title: Invalid Objects / Geçersiz Objeler
description: Identifies invalid or corrupted database objects such as procedures, functions, packages, and views that may cause runtime errors

queries.sql: SELECT OWNER, OBJECT_NAME, OBJECT_TYPE, CREATED, LAST_DDL_TIME, STATUS FROM DBA_OBJECTS WHERE STATUS = 'INVALID' AND OWNER NOT IN ('SYS', 'SYSTEM') ORDER BY CREATED DESC

doc_hint: Zero invalid objects is the target. If found, investigate the owner, object type, and last modification time. May require recompilation or schema refresh.
analysis_prompt: Count total invalid objects by type and owner. Determine if this is a data integrity risk. Recommend recompilation steps if needed.
